attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WHY DONT mp's and ex prime ministers pay there own way, pay for and put there own petrol in vehs they chose to travel in, also pay there own bodyguards/holidays if not donate there contribution to a charity or hosp,If tracking/pay as you drive is put in, maybe we'll save some money from these cheating expenses from MP'S.My parents worked hard to give us a happy time and to maybe show our children a good life & to keep family values, ALL THESE MP'S want to do is make us skint, have no life sit at home and die young of boredom, becouse soon the only people who will be able to afford a life, WILL BE THEM.SAY NO TO ANY MORE TAX SCAMS let us have some fun,if you think the streets have gangs now,just wait till parents are unable to afford a simple day trip or a visit to family due to the cost COME ON MINISTERS THINK BACK TO THE TIMES BEFORE YOU WERE RICH/WEALTHY  OR INHERITED YOUR MONEY, WE YOUR BRITISH PUBLIC WANT A BREAK, BEFORE THIS COUNTRY SINKS...

rejection.details: Please give a specific action for HM Government in the main sentence.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
